160c41e4-c0f4-4ef2-9d4e-6c16290b2d42.name: zero tolerance for bugs
160c41e4-c0f4-4ef2-9d4e-6c16290b2d42.description:
A good software does not have bugs. It just works - it might be simple or even dummy looking, but it just works without bugs.
Bugs are like broken window, have several of them and the value of your building will go down straight to zero.

a8190fd7-dd40-426b-bef8-b5b847dca96f.description: Everything you do now is dependant and will be interdependant to everything hapenning to you. Thus do your best and leave the rest.
a8190fd7-dd40-426b-bef8-b5b847dca96f.name: everything is interconnected in life

c27a5003-6950-4e03-bfa9-2e539bb97405.description:
Any activity which does not aim for more than a 10x impovement in the long run will be outcompeted.
Google.
